title: Mountain Breeze Residence
shortDescription: A spacious 3-bedroom villa with mountain views, a balcony, and modern amenities, located near Kandy city center.
longDescription: Mountain Breeze Residence is a beautifully designed 3-bedroom villa available for rent in Kandy. Situated just 1.4 miles from the city center, this property offers stunning mountain views, a private balcony, and a terrace for relaxation. The air-conditioned villa features a fully equipped kitchen, a private entrance, and free WiFi. With ample living space and modern amenities, including free private parking, itâ€™s an excellent choice for long-term renters seeking comfort and convenience. Located 1.9 miles from Kandy City Center Shopping Mall and 2.4 miles from Bogambara Stadium, the villa provides easy access to local attractions while offering a peaceful retreat.

title: Bali Golden
shortDescription: House having 4-bedrooms with a terrace, garden views, and a pet-friendly atmosphere in Galle
longDescription: Bali Golden is a well-appointed 4-bedroom house available for rent in Galle, offering a comfortable living space with garden views and a private terrace. The house features 2 bathrooms, equipped with a hair dryer and free toiletries, and a cozy living room. It is fully furnished with towels and bed linen provided, and the air-conditioned rooms ensure a pleasant living experience. Tenants can enjoy an American or Asian breakfast setup, and the property includes barbecue facilities for outdoor dining on the private balcony during warmer months. Other amenities include free WiFi, a car rental service, and a paid airport shuttle service. Conveniently located 4.7 miles from Galle International Cricket Stadium and 4.8 miles from Galle Fort, Bali Golden is an ideal residence for those seeking comfort and proximity to local attractions.

location.Address: 231 Kakulama Waththa Yakgaha Walahanduwa, 80000 Galle, Sri Lanka

title: The Five Residences
shortDescription: Experience comfort and convenience, a spacious 3-bedroom apartment near Bonavista Beach in Galle
longDescription: Discover comfort and convenience at The Five Residences in Galle, a stunning 3-bedroom apartment located just an 18-minute walk from Bonavista Beach and one mile from Galle Harbour. This air-conditioned accommodation boasts a spacious living room, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen, and 2 modern bathrooms with a shower. Guests can relax on the private patio or enjoy meals in the outdoor dining area amidst the lush garden. The property features free WiFi, free private parking, and a charming outdoor fireplace for cozy evenings. Ideally situated, it is just 1.9 miles from Galle International Cricket Stadium, 2 miles from Galle Fort, and 8.1 miles from Koggala Airport, making it an excellent choice for both relaxation and exploration

location.Address: No: 27/1B, 1st Lane, Makuluwa, Galle, Sri Lanka

title: Villa Dream Nest
shortDescription: A charming 2-bedroom villa with a balcony, garden views, and modern amenities, perfect for comfortable long-term rental.
longDescription: This cozy 2-bedroom villa offers a serene living space with a balcony and a terrace overlooking a lush garden. The air-conditioned villa features a well-equipped kitchen with a toaster, fridge, and kitchenware, as well as a comfortable seating area with a fireplace. The bathroom is fitted with a bidet and includes bathrobes for added luxury. Modern conveniences such as a satellite flat-screen TV ensure a comfortable stay. The villa also offers sightseeing tours and easy access to both bicycle and car rental services, making it an ideal choice for those looking for a peaceful and convenient rental home.

location.Address: Mihiripenna Meegahawaththa Road, 80600 Unawatuna, Sri Lanka

title: The Hide
shortDescription: A charming 2-bedroom house with a terrace and garden
longDescription: The Hide is a cozy 2-bedroom house in Sri Jayewardenepura Kotte, offering modern amenities and a tranquil atmosphere. The air-conditioned home features a spacious living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and kettle, and a stylish bathroom with a walk-in shower. The private entrance ensures privacy, while the terrace and garden provide outdoor relaxation spaces. Ideal for families or professionals, this also includes free private parking and access to nearby cycling paths. Located just 4.4 miles from Bambalapitiya Railway Station and 5.1 miles from Khan Clock Tower, The Hide combines suburban comfort with city convenience.

location.Address: 941/22 6th lane Kotte road, 10100 Sri Jayewardenepura Kotte, Sri Lanka

title: The Asher Retreat
shortDescription: A tranquil 3-bedroom home near Kandy with stunning mountain views and a plunge pool.
longDescription: A serene home located just 9.3 miles from Kandy Royal Botanic Gardens and 12 miles from Kandy Train Station. This charming property offers a balcony, free private parking, and free WiFi, along with outdoor seating for relaxation. The home features a spacious terrace with breathtaking mountain views, a cozy fireplace, a plunge pool, and a lush garden. With 3 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen, and 3 bathrooms complete with a bathtub, it is the perfect retreat for families or groups. Conveniently situated near popular attractions like Bogambara Stadium (13 miles) and Kandy City Center Shopping Mall (13 miles), The Asher Retreat combines comfort, privacy, and proximity to nature

title: Home From Home
shortDescription: A modern guest house with air-conditioned rooms, private bathrooms, and garden views, located near Bambalapitiya and Diyawanna Oya
longDescription: This guest house offers comfortable accommodations with air-conditioned rooms, free WiFi, and free private parking. Each room is equipped with a desk, a kettle, and a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Certain units also feature a fully equipped kitchen, ideal for longer stays. Guests can enjoy garden views from the terrace and relax in a peaceful setting. Bed linen and towels are provided for convenience. Conveniently located 5 miles from Bambalapitiya Railway Station and 7.2 miles from R Premadasa Stadium, the guest house is just 3.7 miles from Diyawanna Oya Seaplane Base Airport, making it a practical and serene choice for residents or long-term renters.

location.Address: 42 1/1 Rupasiri Mawatha, Mirihana, 10250 Nugegoda, Sri Lanka

title: Embassy Suites
shortDescription: Renovated apartment in Colombo offering modern comforts near top attractions.
longDescription: Embassy Suites provides stylish and recently renovated accommodations in the heart of Colombo, conveniently located near Sinhalese Sports Club and just 1.7 miles from Kollupitiya and Bambalapitiya Beaches. The air-conditioned apartments feature garden views, a seating area, a washing machine, and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, microwave, fridge, stovetop, and kettle. Each unit includes a private bathroom with free toiletries, along with bed linen and towels for added comfort. Guests can unwind in the peaceful garden, while nearby attractions such as the National Art Gallery, Colombo Town Hall, and The Independence Square offer cultural and recreational experiences. Diyawanna Oya Seaplane Base Airport is just 3.7 miles away, making Embassy Suites an ideal choice for both leisure and convenience.

location.Address: 41 R.G. Senanayake Mawatha, Cinnamon Gardens, 00700 Colombo, Sri Lanka
